POS 1 6,8

DLG a
Pomfrey: You must find the magical mug of tea!

DLG b
Hose: I am elephant. I sip tea with my nosenose.

DLG c
Yay! Go South to enjoy your hard-earned tea. :)

DLG d
Useful signpost: Go South. Don't go East or West.

END 0
You win!

END 1
You lose :(
